verbs.description: asian markets mixed as [ARG0: us businesses] [V: caution] [ARG1: against tariffs asian markets] were mixed on wednesday as traders mulled over the impact of tariffs on corporate america after big industrial companies admitted that they were facing rising costs keeping score japan nikkei 225 index jumped 0 8 percent to 22 178 40 as a private survey suggested a recovery in manufacturing in october the shanghai composite index which closed more than 2 percent lower on tuesday jumped 0 6 percent to 2 609 79 hong kong hang seng index was flat at 25 347 78 and the kospi in south korea dropped 0 3 percent to 2 100 71 australia s&p - asx 200 lost 0 2 percent to 5 829 00 shares were lower across the region apart from in singapore trump new york mercantile exchange japan jingyi pan saudi arabia purchasing manager russell analyst new york brent crude south korea joe hayes hurler australia singapore u s ihs markit caterpillar china 3 m co america caterpillar inc us manhattan hong kong joe hayes
